conbody.p: In the database configuration application, you need to create two new attributes in the incident application. The two new attributes are created in the incident application are as follows:

ol.li:
In the incident application, select Incident and Attributes tab. Search for object incident and JIRA endpoint, you can see the following attributes in the section.
CREATEJIRATICKET: Create JIRA ticket attribute is a check box
JIRAENDPOINT: JIRA endpoint is a drop down
Use Application Designer to ensure the fields and the attributes are correct.
